abstract: Bank of America plans to select an emergency chief executive officer this week if legal issues force Kenneth D. Lewis to leave before year-end, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Bank of America plans to select an emergency chief executive officer this week if legal issues force Kenneth D. Lewis to leave before year-end, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America plans to select an emergency chief executive officer this week if legal issues force Kenneth D. Lewis to leave before the end of the year, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing a person familiar with the situation.

headline.main: BofA to Select Emergency Chief This Week, Report Says
